text: Casimir I the Restorer (; b. Kraków, 25 July 1016 - d. Poznań, 28 November 1058), was a Duke of Poland. He was a part of the Piast dynasty and father of Boleslaw II. He is known as "the Restorer" because he reunited the Polish Kingdom. Category:1016 births Category:1058 deaths Category:People from Kraków Category:Piast dynasty Category:Polish dukes
title: Casimir I the Restorer
